19712.<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>「お:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>Oh, THAT's the song you're on about. I think I sang

28478.<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>「昔: <start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>Give me a minute to think back and try to sing it.<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19713.<center>ねーむれ～ よい子よ ねーむれ～。\nねーむれ～ 今すぐ ねーむ:
